summary: CAR WAS SPEEDING UP BY ITSELF AND TOOK ALL I COULD DO TO STOP IT.  ON 02.23.12 TOOK CAR INTO DEALERSHIP AND THEY TESTED.  SAID THE THROTTLE CABLE; BROKE OFF A CORNER OF COVER AND FREED UP CABLE.  STILL HAVING  PROBLEMS, INTERMITTENTLY, WITH CAR DRIVING WITHOUT USE OF GAS PEDAL AND NOT SLOWING DOWN UNTIL I FORCE IT TO.  *TR
